marklogic.body: There is no evidence that Martin hit Zimmerman. No forensic or medical evidence was collected. The blood on Zimmerman could have been (and likely was Martin's blood). Trayvon would have been aspirating for air in the seconds after his fatal chest wound. These agonal respirations often cause Coughing (a Natural instinct when one's lungs are filled with blood instead of air. And Trayvon was shot twice. Zimmerman shot Trayvon at point-blank range. And don't make this about liberals and conservatives. Many conservatives are not racist bigots.
